sentences.sContent: He's got the knack of getting people to listen.
sentences.sCn: 他有让人们倾听的诀窍。

synos.tran: 诀窍；本领；熟练技术；巧妙手法

remMethod.val: 敲开(knock)脑袋， 得到窍门(knack)

trans.tranOther: A knack is a particularly clever or skilful way of doing something successfully, especially something which most people find difficult
